pp-value-2.value: The Company and its subsidiaries (the “Group” or “Meltwater”) help businesses drive growth and build brands. Meltwater’s online intelligence platform analyzes billions of digital documents daily to extract precise, timely business insights that help more than 27,000 companies understandtheir markets, engage their customers, and master the new social business environment.

pp-value-10.value: As of 6 December 2021 the legal form changed from a B.V. to Meltwater N.V.
